description: Approval of details pursuant to condition EG26 of planning permission reference P031256 approved on the 11th August 2003 and condition LR57 of reference P011501 dated 30th May 2002 relating to the design and layout of car parking areas only.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  Potential layout difficulties within the basement area of Block EG1 are currently subject to discussion between the applicant and the potential future occupiers of the healthcare facility within this block.  Accordingly, it is the Councils' expectation that details of any necessary alterations to the basement area to remedy these difficulties should be included in the subsequent details required to fully discharge condition EG26 and LR57.
